title: Political position of FARC and communist efforts

content.question: The political position advocated by FARC in the passage is most consistent with which of the following in the twentieth century?

choices.label: Communist efforts to redistribute agricultural land to peasants
The increasing use of violence against civilians to achieve political aims
The increasing globalization of consumer culture

content.answer: Communist efforts to redistribute agricultural land to peasants

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
